definitions.definition: A speaker placed inside or held near to the ear .
examples: Holding the earpiece to my ear, I could hear him speaking clearly.

definitions.definition: A receiver of a telephone to hold near to one's ear.
The arm on a pair of glasses that hooks over the ear to hold them in place.
examples: My glasses won't stay on, as I've broken the left earpiece .

main_definition: A speaker placed inside or held near to the ear .
secondary_definitions: A receiver of a telephone to hold near to one's ear.
The arm on a pair of glasses that hooks over the ear to hold them in place.
